item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, September 26, 2024 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. NKRYPT Sculpture (85 points | 3 comments)
2. Xkcd 1425 (Tasks) turns ten years old today (763 points | 354 comments)
3. DoNotPay has to pay $193K for falsely touting untested AI lawyer, FTC says (49 points | 34 comments)
4. Italian Music Through the Lens of Complex Networks (56 points | 4 comments)
5. AWS Nitro Enclaves: Attack Surface (59 points | 4 comments)
6. Orion, our first true augmented reality glasses (1096 points | 873 comments)
7. OpenAI to Become For-Profit Company (599 points | 325 comments)
8. Llama 3.2: Revolutionizing edge AI and vision with open, customizable models (787 points | 256 comments)
9. Legalizing Sports Gambling Was a Mistake (30 points | 18 comments)
10. Git-absorb: Git commit –fixup, but automatic (345 points | 177 comments)
11. Show HN: Cronexpr, a Rust library to parse and iter crontab expression (117 points | 20 comments)
12. The Mathematics of Dobble (8 points | 1 comment)
13. Poka Labs (YC S24) Is Hiring a Founding Engineer ( | hide)
14. Octopuses seen hunting together with fish, punching those that don't cooperate (172 points | 131 comments)
15. PostgreSQL 17 (229 points | 39 comments)
16. Hoodmaps: Publicly Annotated City Maps (113 points | 53 comments)
17. Launch HN: Haystack (YC S24) – Visualize and edit code on an infinite canvas (292 points | 152 comments)
18. Eliminating Memory Safety Vulnerabilities at the Source (272 points | 125 comments)
19. Shizuku: App that lets you use system APIs with higher privileges without root (58 points | 21 comments)
20. Vehicles Could Be Hacked and Tracked Thanks to a Simple Website Bug (47 points | 24 comments)
21. Tesla Full Self Driving requires human intervention every 13 miles (37 points | 29 comments)
22. The lost language extensions of MetaWare's High C compiler (2023) (284 points | 91 comments)
23. GitHub-events-viewer a.k.a. "What did I do yesterday?" (60 points | 15 comments)
24. Another new wasp species discovered by researchers (14 points | 10 comments)
25. Timeshare owner? The Mexican drug cartels want you (219 points | 249 comments)
26. Moerenuma Park: A Giant, Gorgeous 'Living Sculpture' in Hokkaido (45 points | 7 comments)
27. Show HN: Httpdbg – A tool to trace the HTTP requests sent by your Python code (173 points | 48 comments)
28. Writing Portable Rendering Code with Nvrhi (19 points | 2 comments)
29. How to avoid a BSOD on your 2B dollar spacecraft (161 points | 118 comments)
30. Why I still blog after 15 years (430 points | 212 comments)
